pjv.evolution

Interface GuiCommunication

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PJVEvolutionController

    public interface GuiCommunication
    Interface that represents all the GUI controlling methods we can call from inside the evolution.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void evolutionStopped()
      When the evolution stops, call this method to enable all the GUI buttons.
      void redrawMap(AbstractIndividual individual)
      Redraws the map canvas according to the current individual.
      void refreshEdgeCoverage(int total, int uncovered)
      Refreshes covered and uncovered edge numbers in the GUI.
      void refreshFitness(double avgFitness, double bestFitness, int gen)
      Refreshes best and average fitness number and plot in the GUI.
      void refreshGeneration(int gen)
      Refreshes generation counter and progress bar in the GUI.
      void refreshVertexCover(int total, int enabled)
      Refreshes vertex cover number and plot in the GUI.
      void setFirstGenerationPanelVisibility(boolean visibility)
      Show or hide the information panel that the first population in evolution is being generated.

    • Method Detail

      • refreshGeneration

        void refreshGeneration(int gen)
        Refreshes generation counter and progress bar in the GUI.
        Parameters:
        gen - generation number

      • refreshVertexCover

        void refreshVertexCover(int total,
                        int enabled)
        Refreshes vertex cover number and plot in the GUI.
        Parameters:
        total - number of nodes
        enabled - number of nodes turned on

      • refreshEdgeCoverage

        void refreshEdgeCoverage(int total,
                         int uncovered)
        Refreshes covered and uncovered edge numbers in the GUI.
        Parameters:
        total - number of edges
        uncovered - number of nodes that are not covered

      • refreshFitness

        void refreshFitness(double avgFitness,
                    double bestFitness,
                    int gen)
        Refreshes best and average fitness number and plot in the GUI.
        Parameters:
        avgFitness - average fitness in the population
        bestFitness - best fitness in the population
        gen - generation count

      • evolutionStopped

        void evolutionStopped()
        When the evolution stops, call this method to enable all the GUI buttons.

      • redrawMap

        void redrawMap(AbstractIndividual individual)
        Redraws the map canvas according to the current individual.
        Parameters:
        individual - usually the best individual from a population

      • setFirstGenerationPanelVisibility

        void setFirstGenerationPanelVisibility(boolean visibility)
        Show or hide the information panel that the first population in evolution is being generated.
        Parameters:
        visibility - true for making it visible, false for hiding it
